techOrbit.subtitle: Tech Stack
techOrbit.title: Technologies We Use
techOrbit.hint: Click any technology to learn how we use it
techOrbit.selectHint: Select a technology to see details

react.name: React
react.desc: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces. We use React for all our web applications.
react.useCase: Web apps, dashboards, SPAs, interactive UIs

python.name: Python
python.desc: Versatile language for backend, automation, and data. Our go-to for Odoo development and scripting.
python.useCase: Odoo modules, APIs, automation, data processing

flutter.name: Flutter
flutter.desc: Google's UI toolkit for cross-platform mobile apps. One codebase for iOS and Android.

docker.name: Docker
docker.desc: Containerization for consistent deployments. Every project runs in isolated environments.

aws.name: AWS
aws.desc: Amazon Web Services for reliable, scalable cloud infrastructure.
aws.useCase: Hosting, S3 storage, Lambda, RDS databases

odoo.name: Odoo
odoo.desc: Open-source ERP system. We are certified partners for implementation and customization.

nextjs.name: Next.js
nextjs.desc: The React framework for production. Server-side rendering, static generation, and API routes.

nodejs.name: Node.js
nodejs.desc: JavaScript runtime for server-side development. Fast, scalable backend services.

tailwind.name: Tailwind CSS
tailwind.desc: Utility-first CSS framework for rapid UI development without leaving your HTML.
tailwind.useCase: All web projects, responsive design, theming

kotlin.name: Kotlin
kotlin.desc: Modern language for Android development. Concise, safe, and fully interoperable with Java.

typescript.name: TypeScript
typescript.desc: Typed JavaScript for large-scale applications. We use TypeScript on every project.

swift.name: Swift
swift.desc: Apple's language for iOS, macOS, and beyond. Fast, modern, and safe.
swift.useCase: Native iOS apps, watchOS, macOS apps

postgresql.name: PostgreSQL
postgresql.desc: The world's most advanced open-source relational database.
postgresql.useCase: All projects requiring relational data storage

git.name: Git
git.desc: Version control for every project. Clean branching strategies and code reviews.

timeline.t1desc: StabilTech was founded by Moise Ioan Jean with a clear vision: deliver reliable, high-quality IT solutions to businesses across Europe.
timeline.t2desc: Expanded our team and delivered our first enterprise-level management systems and mobile applications for German market.
timeline.t3desc: Became certified partners for Odoo and Plentymarkets, specializing in e-commerce integrations and business automation.
timeline.t4desc: Helped dozens of businesses transition online during challenging times with modern web platforms and digital solutions.
timeline.t5desc: Reached 150+ satisfied clients, 200+ completed projects, and expanded our service portfolio to cover full-stack IT consulting.

svc_mobile.heroDesc: We build high-performance native and cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android that your users will love.
svc_mobile.w1: Native iOS applications using Swift and SwiftUI
svc_mobile.w2: Native Android applications using Kotlin and Jetpack Compose
svc_mobile.w3: Cross-platform apps with React Native and Flutter
svc_mobile.w4: UI/UX design optimized for mobile experiences
svc_mobile.w5: App Store and Google Play deployment and optimization
svc_mobile.w6: Push notifications, offline mode, and real-time features
svc_mobile.w7: Integration with REST APIs, GraphQL, and backend systems
svc_mobile.w8: Ongoing maintenance, updates, and performance monitoring
svc_mobile.p1d: We analyze your needs, create wireframes, and design intuitive user interfaces that work across all devices.
svc_mobile.p2d: Agile development with continuous testing on real devices. We ensure quality at every sprint.
svc_mobile.p3d: We handle the entire submission process for App Store and Google Play, including optimization for visibility.
svc_mobile.p4d: Ongoing bug fixes, OS compatibility updates, and new feature development to keep your app competitive.
svc_mobile.pr1d: Built a full-featured shopping app with payment integration, push notifications, and order tracking for a German retail company.
svc_mobile.pr2d: Developed an offline-capable mobile app for technicians to manage work orders, capture photos, and sync data in the field.
svc_mobile.pr3d: Created a reservation and ordering app with real-time availability, loyalty program, and multi-location support.

svc_web.heroDesc: Modern, fast, and responsive websites and web applications built with the latest technologies for maximum performance.
svc_web.w1: Corporate websites and landing pages with modern design
svc_web.w3: E-commerce platforms with full payment integration
svc_web.w4: Progressive Web Apps (PWA) for offline functionality
svc_web.w6: Performance optimization for Core Web Vitals
svc_web.w7: Responsive design that works on every screen size
svc_web.p1d: We define the sitemap, tech stack, and architecture. Every project starts with a clear technical plan.
svc_web.p2d: High-fidelity designs and interactive prototypes before a single line of code is written.
svc_web.p3d: Clean, maintainable code with automated testing. We build for speed and scalability.
svc_web.p4d: Deployment with monitoring, SEO setup, and continuous performance optimization.
svc_web.pr1d: Rebuilt a corporate website with multi-language support, CMS integration, and 95+ Lighthouse score for a logistics company.
svc_web.pr2d: Developed a real-time analytics dashboard with role-based access, data visualization, and API integrations.
svc_web.pr3d: Built a custom e-commerce platform with Stripe payments, inventory management, and automated email flows.

svc_management.heroDesc: Custom-built business management systems that streamline your operations, reduce manual work, and give you full control.
svc_management.w3: Human resource and employee management platforms
svc_management.w4: Project management and task tracking tools
svc_management.w8: Integration with existing tools and databases
svc_management.p1d: We map your current workflows, identify bottlenecks, and define the exact features your system needs.
svc_management.p2d: Database architecture, user roles, and interface design tailored to how your team actually works.
svc_management.p3d: We build in phases so you can test and give feedback early. No surprises at launch.
svc_management.p4d: Complete documentation, staff training, and a smooth transition from old systems to new.
svc_management.pr1d: Built a real-time inventory system with barcode scanning, stock alerts, and multi-warehouse support for a distribution company.
svc_management.pr2d: Developed a custom CRM with lead tracking, email automation, sales pipeline, and reporting for a B2B services firm.
svc_management.pr3d: Created an employee portal with time tracking, leave management, payroll integration, and performance reviews.

svc_seo.heroDesc: Data-driven SEO strategies that increase your organic visibility, drive qualified traffic, and improve conversion rates.
svc_seo.w4: Site speed and Core Web Vitals optimization
svc_seo.w5: Schema markup and structured data implementation
svc_seo.p1d: Complete technical and content audit of your current site. We find every issue holding you back.
svc_seo.p2d: Research-backed keyword strategy aligned with your business goals and audience search intent.
svc_seo.p3d: We fix technical issues, optimize content, improve site speed, and set up tracking.
svc_seo.p4d: Monthly reports with ranking changes, traffic data, and next steps. Transparent results.
svc_seo.pr1d: Increased organic traffic by 340% in 8 months for an online retailer through technical fixes and content optimization.
svc_seo.pr2d: Ranked a service company #1 in local search results across 5 cities with targeted local SEO strategy.
svc_seo.pr3d: Built a content-driven SEO strategy that generated 2,000+ monthly organic leads for a software platform.

svc_erp.heroDesc: Seamless integration with Odoo, Plentymarkets, and other ERP systems to automate your business processes end-to-end.
svc_erp.w1: Odoo implementation, customization, and module development
svc_erp.w3: Data migration from legacy systems to modern ERP
svc_erp.w5: Automated order processing and fulfillment workflows
svc_erp.w8: API development for third-party system connections
svc_erp.p1d: We evaluate your current systems, data flows, and pain points to design the optimal integration architecture.
svc_erp.p2d: Set up and customize the ERP to match your specific business processes. No generic templates.
svc_erp.p3d: Clean, validate, and migrate your data with zero downtime. We ensure nothing gets lost in transition.
svc_erp.p4d: Staged rollout with dedicated support. We stay with you until everything runs smoothly.
svc_erp.pr1d: Implemented Odoo for a manufacturing company covering sales, inventory, production, and accounting with custom modules.
svc_erp.pr2d: Connected Plentymarkets with Amazon, eBay, and a custom webshop with real-time stock sync and automated order processing.
svc_erp.pr3d: Built custom APIs to connect an ERP, CRM, and warehouse system into a unified data pipeline for a logistics firm.

svc_custom.heroDesc: When off-the-shelf doesn't cut it, we build bespoke software solutions designed exactly around your unique business requirements.
svc_custom.w2: Automation tools for repetitive business processes
svc_custom.w3: Data processing pipelines and ETL systems
svc_custom.p1d: We work with you to clearly define the problem, constraints, and success criteria before writing any code.
svc_custom.p2d: Scalable system architecture, database design, and API contracts. Built to grow with your business.
svc_custom.p3d: Two-week sprints with demos after each. You see progress and can adjust direction in real-time.
svc_custom.p4d: CI/CD pipelines, monitoring, and SLA-backed support to keep your system running at peak performance.
svc_custom.pr1d: Built a custom automation tool that reduced manual data entry by 90% for a financial services company.
svc_custom.pr2d: Developed a real-time data processing system handling 100K+ events per hour for an IoT platform.
svc_custom.pr3d: Migrated a 15-year-old desktop application to a modern web-based platform with zero data loss.

opensourcePage.title: Open Source & Community
opensourcePage.desc: We believe in giving back. We contribute to open-source projects, accept suggestions, and collaborate with the community.
opensourcePage.reposDesc: We open-source tools, templates, and utilities that we build internally. Free for everyone to use and improve.
opensourcePage.prsDesc: Found a bug? Have a feature idea? We actively review and merge community contributions.
opensourcePage.ideasDesc: We listen. Open an issue, start a discussion, or email us. Every idea is considered.

svc_ai.heroDesc: We implement intelligent systems that transform your business - from RAG architectures to custom model fine-tuning.
svc_ai.w5: Custom AI pipelines for data analysis
svc_ai.w6: Integration of AI models into existing systems
svc_ai.w8: AI strategy consulting and feasibility analysis
svc_ai.p1d: We evaluate your data, use cases, and goals to define the optimal AI approach for your business.
svc_ai.p2d: Clean, structure, and prepare your data for training or RAG indexing. Quality data = quality results.
svc_ai.p3d: Build RAG pipelines, fine-tune models, and develop the AI solution tailored to your needs.
svc_ai.p4d: Deploy to production with monitoring, evaluation metrics, and continuous improvement.
svc_ai.pr1d: Built a RAG system that searches 10,000+ company documents and answers employee questions in real-time.
svc_ai.pr2d: Fine-tuned an LLM for a SaaS company that handles 70% of support tickets automatically with 95% accuracy.
svc_ai.pr3d: AI pipeline that extracts and classifies data from invoices, contracts, and forms - reducing manual work by 85%.

seoContent.cs1problem: An online retailer with 2,000+ products was barely visible on Google. Duplicate content, slow load times, and zero structured data.
seoContent.cs1solution: Complete technical overhaul: canonical tags for all product variants, image compression reducing load time from 8s to 1.8s, schema markup for all products, and strategic internal linking.
seoContent.cs1takeaway: Technical SEO is the foundation. No amount of content will fix a broken site architecture.
seoContent.cs2problem: A service company operating in 5 German cities had no local visibility. No Google Business profiles, no local landing pages, inconsistent NAP data.
seoContent.cs2solution: Created and optimized Google Business profiles for each location, built dedicated city landing pages with local content, implemented review generation strategy, and fixed all directory listings.
seoContent.cs2takeaway: Local SEO is a different game. Google Business Profile optimization alone can transform a local business.
seoContent.cs3problem: A B2B SaaS platform relied entirely on paid ads. Zero organic presence, no blog, no resource pages.
seoContent.cs3solution: Built a comprehensive content strategy: pillar pages for core topics, comparison articles targeting competitor keywords, and a resource hub with templates and guides that became link magnets.
seoContent.cs3takeaway: For SaaS, content that solves real problems generates better leads than any ad campaign.
seoContent.do1d: Google rewards content that genuinely helps users. Focus on answering real questions.
seoContent.do2d: Before creating content, ensure your site loads fast, is mobile-friendly, and has no crawl errors.
seoContent.do3d: /services/web-development is better than /page?id=42. Clear URLs help both users and search engines.
seoContent.do4d: LCP under 2.5s, FID under 100ms, CLS under 0.1. These directly impact rankings.
seoContent.do5d: Cover your topic comprehensively. 20 deep articles on one topic beat 100 shallow articles on different topics.
seoContent.do6d: Schema markup helps Google understand your content and can earn rich snippets in search results.
seoContent.do7d: Link related content together. It helps users navigate and distributes page authority across your site.
seoContent.do8d: SEO is not set-and-forget. Track rankings monthly, analyze what works, and double down on it.
seoContent.dont1d: Repeating keywords unnaturally hurts readability and can trigger Google penalties.
seoContent.dont2d: Paid link schemes violate Google guidelines. One penalty can wipe your rankings overnight.
seoContent.dont3d: Copy-pasting content across pages confuses Google. Use canonical tags or rewrite unique content.
seoContent.dont4d: Google uses mobile-first indexing. If your mobile experience is bad, your rankings will suffer.
seoContent.dont5d: Pages with 100 words of generic text add no value. Merge thin pages or expand them substantially.
seoContent.dont6d: While not a ranking factor, they directly impact click-through rates from search results.
seoContent.dont7d: Cheap hosting with 3+ second response times kills your performance scores and user experience.
seoContent.dont8d: SEO takes 3-6 months minimum. Anyone promising page 1 in 2 weeks is lying.
